metadata.title: CVE-2022-26353 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the virtio-net device of QEMU. This flaw wasinadvertently introduced with the fix for CVE-2021-3748, which forgot tounmap the cached virtqueue elements on error, leading to memory leakage andother unexpected results. Affected QEMU version: 6.2.0.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
